name: getPublicKey
description:
Refer GET /configs/publicKey.
The get public key service provides the customer the public key that should be used to encrypt the user credentials before sending it to Yodlee.
This endpoint is useful only for PKI enabled.

$ul:
**keyAlias**: The key name used for encryption.

Endpoints:
  • GET cobrand/publicKey

**keyAsPemString**: Public key that the customer should be using to encrypt the credentials and answers before sending to the add & update providerAccounts APIs.

Endpoints:
  • GET cobrand/publicKey
